battle_weapon.legendary:
The enemy seems to have dropped something. 
There is a flash of bright light, and you think you hear angels singing in the background. Or you might be going crazy. On the ground, you see a brilliant curved blade. 

 You have gained The Legendary Sword!
battle_weapon.wand:
The enemy seems to have dropped something in a pile of white snow. You feel a cold gust of wind as you step closer, sending a chill down your spine. An ice blue stick lies on the floor in a pile of some special kind of unmeltable snow. 

 You have gained an Ice Wand!
battle_weapon.wooden:
The enemy seems to have dropped something. 
 It seems to be a wooden sword.  

 You have gained a Wooden Sword!
battle_weapon.stone:
The enemy seems to have dropped something. 
 You spot the solid stone blade lying on the floor. 

 You have gained a Stone Sword!

tutorial:
You have stumbled across your first enemy crawling around in your terminal! You can run, but that hasn’t been implemented. So you’re forced to battle your foe. Sorry!

>> Using any food item will grant you a generous amount of hp (or not.. depends on how lucky you are with your meat). However, you miss an attack turn.
>> Selecting empty slots, or any non-weapons will either cause you to attack with your fist, or trigger a special event with said item.
>> Selecting your health bar will just display your health bar. Nothing else happens.
>> Using any weapon boosts your damage (amount depends on the weapon).

 That’s basically it. Good luck!

prompts.1: An error message suddenly appears, and you realize it’s not just a bug—it’s a hostile code entity trying to corrupt your files.
prompts.2: You were just walking when you see something flicker out of the corner of your eye. A string of binary code begins to rearrange itself into the shape of a monstrous creature, its eyes glowing menacingly.
prompts.3: As you walk through a dimly lit alley, a shadowy figure steps out from the darkness, blocking your path with a menacing grin
prompts.4: While hiking through a dense forest, you suddenly feel watched. Turning around, you see a figure partially hidden among the trees, their intentions unclear, but definitely not good..
